name: Ook Oookk ( Un Amour de Banane )
name_original: Ook Oookk ( Un Amour de Banane )
description:
Born at Global Game Jam 2020 - Globant North Park, Buenos Aires!

You're the jungle couples counselor, and your job is to mend the often toxic relationships of your primate friends. Listen carefully and pay attention to their body language, or you might end up with a falling out!!

The Team

Tomás Aguilar - Art & Game design

Juan Ignacio Menendez - Programming

Pablo Canaveris - Sound design &  Game design

Mercedes Grazzini - Art & Game design

Yamila Endrizzi - Art

Ignacio Rosa: Programming, Animation - Unity Connect

Catalina Ronconi - Art & QA
